headline: Singapore Cross Island MRT Escalator and Elevator Win Could Be a Game Changer for Otis Worldwide (OTIS)
summary: Singapore's Land Transport Authority announced in August 2025 that Otis Worldwide was selected to supply 336 escalators and moving walkways and 186 Gen3™ elevators for the new Cross Island MRT line, the city-state’s longest fully underground rail project. This project highlights Otis's integration of IoT-enabled solutions and its established role in global mass transit infrastructure, underlining continuing international demand for its connected and durable equipment. We'll explore how...
